text: Fabian Anthony Forte (born February 6, 1943), professionally known as Fabian, is an American singer and actor. He became well known for his appearances on American Bandstand. He became a teen idol of the late 1950s and early 1960s.Fabian Forte interview. PopEntertainment.com (2007-09-19). Retrieved on 2015-05-29. Eleven of his songs reached the Billboard Hot 100. Fabian was also considered for roles in West Side Story (1961) and The Roman Spring of Mrs Stone.All the Actors in Tony Crawley's Casting Calls. Crawleyscastingcalls.com. title: Fabian Forte
